name: Yayy
wishText: May the love and warmth you give always come back to you! ❤️
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to the most amazing mom in the world!! 💐 Many happy returns of the day!
text2: I was thinking about how to make today even more amazing.
outroText: Now, go enjoy your day, and let me know if you liked this surprise!
replayText: Or click to watch it again!
